long_description: German-engineered front fender for suspension forks looks moto and is easy to attach and detach. Shock-resistant plastic Shockboard material is durable and stiff no matter how much abuse it gets. Perfectly sized to catch dirt (80mm), yet it still allows for ample foot room. Easily detaches with a special quick-release mechanism, by just pressing a button.
short_description: German-engineered front fender for suspension forks looks moto and is easy to attach and detach.
